001package com.commercetools.graphql.api.types;
002
003import java.lang.Boolean;
004import java.lang.Object;
005import java.lang.Override;
006import java.lang.String;
007import java.util.List;
008
009/**
010 * Field definitions describe custom fields and allow you to define some meta-information associated with the field.
011 */
012public class FieldDefinition {
013  private String name;
014
015  private Boolean required;
016
017  private TextInputHint inputHint;
018
019  private String label;
020
021  private List<LocalizedString> labelAllLocales;
022
023  private FieldType type;
024
025  public FieldDefinition() {
026  }
027
028  public FieldDefinition(String name, Boolean required, TextInputHint inputHint, String label,
029      List<LocalizedString> labelAllLocales, FieldType type) {
030    this.name = name;
031    this.required = required;
032    this.inputHint = inputHint;
033    this.label = label;
034    this.labelAllLocales = labelAllLocales;
035    this.type = type;
036  }
037
038  public String getName() {
039    return name;
040  }
041
042  public void setName(String name) {
043    this.name = name;
044  }
045
046  public Boolean getRequired() {
047    return required;
048  }
049
050  public void setRequired(Boolean required) {
051    this.required = required;
052  }
053
054  public TextInputHint getInputHint() {
055    return inputHint;
056  }
057
058  public void setInputHint(TextInputHint inputHint) {
059    this.inputHint = inputHint;
060  }
061
062  public String getLabel() {
063    return label;
064  }
065
066  public void setLabel(String label) {
067    this.label = label;
068  }
069
070  public List<LocalizedString> getLabelAllLocales() {
071    return labelAllLocales;
072  }
073
074  public void setLabelAllLocales(List<LocalizedString> labelAllLocales) {
075    this.labelAllLocales = labelAllLocales;
076  }
077
078  public FieldType getType() {
079    return type;
080  }
081
082  public void setType(FieldType type) {
083    this.type = type;
084  }
085
086  @Override
087  public String toString() {
088    return "FieldDefinition{" + "name='" + name + "'," +"required='" + required + "'," +"inputHint='" + inputHint + "'," +"label='" + label + "'," +"labelAllLocales='" + labelAllLocales + "'," +"type='" + type + "'" +"}";
089  }
090
091  @Override
092  public boolean equals(Object o) {
093    if (this == o) return true;
094        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
095        FieldDefinition that = (FieldDefinition) o;
096        return java.util.Objects.equals(name, that.name) &&
097                            java.util.Objects.equals(required, that.required) &&
098                            java.util.Objects.equals(inputHint, that.inputHint) &&
099                            java.util.Objects.equals(label, that.label) &&
100                            java.util.Objects.equals(labelAllLocales, that.labelAllLocales) &&
101                            java.util.Objects.equals(type, that.type);
102  }
103
104  @Override
105  public int hashCode() {
106    return java.util.Objects.hash(name, required, inputHint, label, labelAllLocales, type);
107  }
108
109  public static com.commercetools.graphql.api.types.FieldDefinition.Builder newBuilder() {
110    return new Builder();
111  }
112
113  public static class Builder {
114    private String name;
115
116    private Boolean required;
117
118    private TextInputHint inputHint;
119
120    private String label;
121
122    private List<LocalizedString> labelAllLocales;
123
124    private FieldType type;
125
126    public FieldDefinition build() {
127                  com.commercetools.graphql.api.types.FieldDefinition result = new com.commercetools.graphql.api.types.FieldDefinition();
128                      result.name = this.name;
129          result.required = this.required;
130          result.inputHint = this.inputHint;
131          result.label = this.label;
132          result.labelAllLocales = this.labelAllLocales;
133          result.type = this.type;
134                      return result;
135    }
136
137    public com.commercetools.graphql.api.types.FieldDefinition.Builder name(String name) {
138      this.name = name;
139      return this;
140    }
141
142    public com.commercetools.graphql.api.types.FieldDefinition.Builder required(Boolean required) {
143      this.required = required;
144      return this;
145    }
146
147    public com.commercetools.graphql.api.types.FieldDefinition.Builder inputHint(
148        TextInputHint inputHint) {
149      this.inputHint = inputHint;
150      return this;
151    }
152
153    public com.commercetools.graphql.api.types.FieldDefinition.Builder label(String label) {
154      this.label = label;
155      return this;
156    }
157
158    public com.commercetools.graphql.api.types.FieldDefinition.Builder labelAllLocales(
159        List<LocalizedString> labelAllLocales) {
160      this.labelAllLocales = labelAllLocales;
161      return this;
162    }
163
164    public com.commercetools.graphql.api.types.FieldDefinition.Builder type(FieldType type) {
165      this.type = type;
166      return this;
167    }
168  }
169}
